name: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Hotel Astoria

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The location of this hotel was excellent, just a 10 minute walk away from the main square. The room was okay - very clean but a little dated and the bathroom was very akward. It was tough to get out of the shower without bumping into the toilet. We had dinner there one night; I would definitely recommend against it. The food was buffet style and not laid out in a very appealing way. Taste was just so-so and not . And the breakfast buffet was just average. If you're looking for a very clean, moderate priced hotel in a good location this might be the place to stay. Just find somewhere else to eat.
reviews.title: Good location, pleasant staff, average rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: The hotel location was optimal for who wants to go around. And Hotel was also classy. I feel comfortable at the hotel. But room was a little bit small. Staff was simily , helpful and kind. I liked it, if i go there again will be there absolutly.
reviews.title: Lovely location and with good price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013
reviews.text: This is a small business hotel with no great views but very efficient and friendly staff, perfectly located. For a night or two in Zagreb this is the best!!!!
reviews.title: Great on all accounts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are not too big but clean and new. The hotel is affordable (I paid 70 EUR for the night I spent). Definitely the best deal in town.
reviews.title: Affordable luxury

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The suite we had was much more than we needed but gave us the convenience of two toilets and sinks plus a palce to sit and read while one of us slept. The buffet breakfasts were excellent as well. The hotel is convenient to downtown attractions
reviews.title: Spotlessly Clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We walked in from the train station without a reservation and lucked out with a great suite with dinner and breakfast included for under $100. The staff was great and the buffet was excellent. The room was huge and after Italy, we were very happy with the price. We stayed three days instead of the one we were planning.
reviews.title: More for you Buck

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 2 nights in the quite beautiful suite room on the 5th floor overlooking the courtyard. (I understand, there is a space difference between the regular rooms and suites, so check the rates and the rooms so that you get what you paid for).
reviews.title: Best hotel to stay in Zagreb - Best Western Hotel Astoria

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room is soundproofed, so I slept very well.
reviews.title: Central and convenient

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is classy and also spotlessly clean. There is free internet in the business center and you can print your maps or emails for free. In the room wireless internet is also free.
reviews.title: Everything one needs for a quick trip to Zagreb

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: Hotel is extremely well located near the central rail and bus station, but in the quiet side street. Staff is fantastic, helpful and spoke well English .
reviews.title: A Nice Business Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010
reviews.text: I stayed for one night. It is an old, characterful building, well placed for sightseeing in Zagreb. My room was clean and well appointed. It was not noisy and I slept well.The staff were helpful and spoke English.
reviews.title: Ideal place to stay in Zagreb.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: Dinner weas a buffet and as a vegetarian there was nothing for me. However, they promptly made me a tasty dish of pasta and I was very happy! Breakfast was fine.
reviews.title: Could be excellent, but...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: I can't think of anything to complain about!
reviews.title: Above average quality with small rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A very good hotel and could be excellent, but... rooms are very different from each other. I stayed for 4 nights and had to change 4 rooms because each one had something broken (except for the last one). So I could experience these differences. Rooms to the back side look directly on the wall and are very small. Rooms to the street and to the yard are much nicer.
reviews.title: Great hotel, small room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Restaurant is very good both for breakfast and dinner. There is free internet in the business center. Location is near the central station, but still quiet. Staff is very polite and attentive.
reviews.title: I just liked it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: We were 5-10 minutes from everything in the area. Zagreb is a nice city with plenty to see and do and we were in the area.
reviews.title: Really nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel itself is very clean and the room was nice and big - for European standards.
reviews.title: CAUTION WITH THE PRICES. I DON'T WILL BE BACK

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff was very friendly and even has free internet and free printing. When the printer was broke, they allowed me to use their computer behind the desk. Wonderful!
reviews.title: Exceeded expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: This is a very nice hotel in a good location in Zagreb. The people who work there are pleasant and helpful. The rooms are nice, the bathrooms large and all is clean and tidy. The breakfast is very nice. They had at least 10 types of cheese, meats, yogurt, cereal, breads, etc. They also had hot foods with two types of eggs, meats, veggies, pancakes and crepes. The coffee was fine but the juice wasn't real juice.
reviews.title: typical chain hotel but more upscale that BW usually is

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: When they called me a taxi, they used Eco cab which is the cheapest in the city. It only cost 95 kuna to the airport.
reviews.title: ideal for a city break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: The hotel is situated approx 2 min walk from the main station and 5-10 min walk from the central town square.
reviews.title: A sure bet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: The hotel was clean and the staff very freindly and helpfull.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was clean and big enough. it was equiped with TV, tea and coffee making facilities, safe, air con and mini bar. The room was very quiet at night.
reviews.title: Great hotel
Good but not excellent
reviews.text: The hotel is very close to the city center; it is another hotel right in the city center but very expensive...so we looked around and found this one - we did not have any reservations done.

reviews.title: The best location, very friendly staff and nice cold champagne with the breakfast...
reviews.text: At few steps is the city center, as I said..it is a nice city, with a big pedestrian area, only trams are allowed. You have to check out the fresh produce market..amazing, on 2 or 3 storeys..you should try their meats - awesome!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We ended up staying in a Deluxe Quality room with a king-size bed. Beautiful room with air-conditioning and WiFi. Parking was also included, a bonus in downtown hotels close to old city sections.
reviews.title: Very nice stay in Zagreb

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011
reviews.text: The room was quite large and had all we could want, wonderful full buffet breakfast was also included.
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are vegetarians and so were pleasantly surprised to find that the hotel restaurant included lots of veggie dishes, not all that easy to find in Croatia. The hotel was a ten minute or so walk to the historical centre of Zagreb. You will want to pick your walk into town to walk along the park and not down the busy, not too attractive, street.
reviews.title: Good value and Location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all a very pleasant stay at the Best Western Premier hotel.
reviews.title: Better than a 5 star hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Good service, friendly staff clean rooms good breakfast
reviews.title: Great Value, Good Location, But Service A Mixed Bag

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We booked 3 nights based on the reviews of Tripadvisor and were not disappointed. We have had a Double Executive Room for a few euros more and given the spacious room we have on the top floorI think it's worth the extra. Breakfast was excellent - fresh, lots of choices (and they changed them too thru our 3-night stay), tasty and, most important of more, they really cared about the business - more than once I saw the chef went out to check. This is one of the reasons why we had dinner on one night - a very good valued weekly menu for 70 kunas and it was again excellent.
reviews.title: Great location, excellent value and very nice stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel itself is well-located within walking distance (10-15 minutes at very leisure pace) to major sights. From the main bus station, where you are dropped off by the Croatian airport shuttle bus if you are flying in to Zagreb, take Tram # 2 or #6 direction train station and alight at the third stop. You are then 5 minutes on foot from the hotel, even with luggage.
reviews.title: Lack of Air Conditioning

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So pleased that we booked this hotel. Excellent value for money and in an excellent location with a superb breakfast, I cannot find anything to fault. The large bedroom was comfortable and the bathroom included a bathtub and shower. Staff were helpful and being close to the main station, it was very convenient for trips to Slovenia (around 20€ return to Ljubljana) and the restaurants in town a 10 min stroll. Don't hestitate, book this place!
reviews.title: The best choice for Zagreb

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011
reviews.text: We travelling as a party of 12 on a reunion trip. The Astoria was chosen by one of our party who had stayed there 5 years previously. On arrival reception staff were prepared for us and completed the check in process, for 6 couples, both quickly and effectively.
reviews.title: Friendly and helpful staff; clean and comfortable accommodation.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms were clean and comfortable, if slightly small. However, when I tried to access the room safe it would not open and I called Reception for help. We were pleasantly surprised when a polite maintenace man arrive within 5 minutes. He fixed the fault and explained the reason why the safe had malfunctioned, and left with a smile.
reviews.title: Astoundingly good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed there only for one night before going to Dubrovnik. The place of the hotel is very close to center of the city, and nearly everything is walking distance. Stuff is well educated and able to communicate in English very well. However our room is very small, with two luggage, one is cabin size, we had trboule in the room, where to put them, how to open them etc. For whom staying there, my advise is having breakfast at the hotel. For the price I've paid, I didn't expect such a breakfast.
reviews.title: Very Convinient Place but Small Rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled solo
reviews.text: I spent 3 nights at the Best Western Hotel Astoria in mid-June and found that it suited my needs extremely well.
reviews.title: Well located and very helpful staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: My single room was clean, nicely furnished, and well appointed. I found it comfortable, but it was small enough that some people might consider it too cramped. For example, there wasn’t much space to either side of the bed. To save on energy, electricity to the room is controlled by your key card and is cut off when you remove the key upon exiting. That means that there will be no electricity to charge camera batteries or other items in your absence. As noted on the information card in the room, you can take those items (along with your charger) to the reception desk, where staff will charge them while you are away.
reviews.title: The Ideal Hotel in Zagreb

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Hotel Astoria was a perfect pick for my three night debut stay in Zagreb. It is centrally located, it has good facilities and all the staff is extremely polite and helpful.
reviews.title: Look for no other in Zagreb

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: LOCATION:
reviews.title: Good location, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is located in a quiet one way street near Strossmayer square, a five minute walk from Zagreb’s central train station. Ban Jelačić Square, the Kaptol, the Upper Town and many other major attractions are within walking distance.
reviews.title: Very Good hotel in Zagreb

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: FACILITIES:
reviews.title: The best Best Western I've been too

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Facilities comprise a five floor building and both the interior and exterior are in good shape. Decoration is in an old fashioned (but good) way and the elevator is spacious.
reviews.title: Good value, lovely hotel

description: The first-class hotel BEST WESTERN PREMIER Hotel Astoria **** in the centre of the Croatian capital casts its spell with its wonderful 30ies charm. 100 luxurious rooms with all amenities, business center with 4 fully equipped conference rooms, the exquisite restaurant Ragusa and the elegant Glama Bar with affiliated pastry shop create an oasis of recreation for business travellers and city tourists.Hotel guests have on disposal a FREE private parking in the courtyard within hotel.
